time.description: Time in ms to aspirate or dispense / keep vacuum or pressure open

clearance.description: The pipette height to clear the destination plate

pipette_swing.description: The height to move pipette in order to rotate it in/out from the microscope

defaults.description: Default settings to use for reset and archive

TL_corner.description: The stage positions of well A01, in um

BR_corner.description: The stage positions of the highest well, in um
